name: Kind Cat Token
description: Kind Cat Token (KIND) is a community-driven meme-powered DeFi token built on the BNB Smart Chain. The project combines entertainment, utility, and sustainable tokenomics to create a long-term ecosystem rather than a short-lived meme trend. KIND emphasizes transparency, deflationary mechanics, and real user-focused utilities designed to promote stable growth and strong community participation. Launched on August 30th, 2025, the project is developed and managed by Kind Cat Labs LTD, a registered company committed to building blockchain tools and accessible financial products for global users.
